name: Plastic Vases
description: Vases made from durable plastic material, suitable for displaying flowers and decorative arrangements.

name: Plastic Wall Clocks
description: Clocks with plastic frames and dials, available in various designs and colors for wall decoration.

name: Plastic Picture Frames
description: Frames made from lightweight plastic for displaying photographs and artwork on walls and tabletops.

name: Plastic Artificial Plants
description: Artificial plants and flowers made from plastic for decorating homes and offices without the need for watering or maintenance.

name: Plastic Candles
description: Candles made from plastic material, available in various colors and designs for decorative purposes.

name: Plastic Wall Decals
description: Decals made from vinyl plastic for decorating walls with removable and repositionable designs and patterns.

name: Plastic Lamp Shades
description: Lamp shades made from plastic material, available in various shapes and sizes for diffusing light and adding decorative accents to lamps.

name: Plastic Sculptures
description: Sculptures and figurines made from plastic material, available in modern and traditional designs for tabletop and shelf decoration.

name: Plastic Wall Mirrors
description: Mirrors with plastic frames, available in decorative designs and shapes for enhancing the aesthetics of walls.

name: Plastic Decorative Bowls
description: Bowls made from plastic for displaying decorative items such as potpourri, fruits, and ornaments on tabletops and shelves.
